discussion.title: Closed-Form Interpretation of Neural Network Classifiers with Symbolic Regression Gradients
discussion.body:
Thank you all and especially Miles for setting up this library and all the helpful comments here! It helped me to develop a neural network interpretation method tailored to what I need for my artificial scientific discovery projects. 

https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.04978

nodes.body:
Nice work, congrats!

By the way, if you want, you could add it here: https://github.com/MilesCranmer/PySR/blob/master/docs/papers.yml and it will show up on the applications page: https://astroautomata.com/PySR/papers/.
